title: The Shelf Life of a 12-Foot Home Depot Skeleton
description: Devotees have spent years hunting for a 12-foot skeleton introduced by the Home Depot in 2020. Can the hype survive?
dc:creator: Callie Holtermann
media:credit: Bryan Anselm for The New York Times
media:description: Nicknamed Skelly, the product has roughly 164 plastic bones, or about 80 percent of the 206 in an adult human body.
